TopicTitle: Does the Saitek X-55 joystick work with Linux?

Articles.Content:
I'm really interested in this and I want to know whether it will work with Ubuntu, seeing as there are only Windows drivers with it. I am aware that I will need to install Advanced Fly By Wire mod.

Edited July 23, 2015 by Rocketmaster
Maybe a bit late, but I can confirm it works. I'm using opensuse and the advanced fly by wire mod.
